definition: peasant woman (in former times)/female farm worker

sentences.english: The story about the farmer and her chicken eggs teaches us an important lesson about blogging.
sentences.chinese: 农妇和鸡蛋的故事教给我们关于写博客的重要一课。

sentences.english: LANNY BERMAN:"In China, particularly rural or farm women die by suicide by overdose of pesticide."
sentences.chinese: 在中国，尤其是农妇经常过量服用杀虫剂来自杀。

sentences.english: The next morning the cattle dealer came, and the woman had no need to say many words to him.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，牛贩子来了，农妇对他没有过多的寒喧。

sentences.english: Finally, after all of this, the farmer was dismayed to find that only one chicken egg was produced.
sentences.chinese: 最后，农妇失望的发现只得到了一个鸡蛋。

sentences.english: There was once a farmer who wanted to produce 201 chicken eggs.
sentences.chinese: 从前有一个农妇想要生产201个鸡蛋。

sentences.english: The farmer apologized to the sage because all she had was one egg to feed him and his followers.
sentences.chinese: 农妇向智者道歉，因为她只有一个鸡蛋可以招待他们。

sentences.english: The farmer went to bed that night feeling troubled.
sentences.chinese: 夜里，农妇躺在床上，忐忑不安辗转难眠。

sentences.english: He then was introduced to the woman’s mother, and to her children.
sentences.chinese: 农妇把他介绍给她的母亲和孩子们。

sentences.english: Conjoined twins with two heads born at a hospital in Suining.
sentences.chinese: 四川遂宁一农妇诞下“连体双头婴儿”。

definition: School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
old man/I (an old man referring to himself)
